name: Sound Forge Pro Audio Peak File

description: When opening a WAV file with Sound Forge Pro or VEGAS Pro, the software automatically creates the SFK file in the same directory as the WAV file. If another program modifies the related WAV audio file, you can regenerate the SFK peak file by selecting Rebuild Peak Data from the Special menu in Sound Forge.
NOTE: Sonic Foundry initially developed Sound Forge Pro until Sony acquired the application in 2003. Then, MAGIX acquired Sound Forge Pro in 2016.

common_filenames.description: [same_name_as_the_WAV_file].sfk - MAGIX Sound Forge Pro or VEGAS Pro name SFK files with the same name as the WAV file. For example, an audio.wav is accompanied by an audio.sfk file.
[same_name_as_the_WAV_file].sfk - MAGIX Sound Forge Pro or VEGAS Pro name SFK files with the same name as the WAV file. For example, an audio.wav is accompanied by an audio.sfk file.
[same_name_as_the_WAV_file].sfk - MAGIX Sound Forge Pro or VEGAS Pro name SFK files with the same name as the WAV file. For example, an audio.wav is accompanied by an audio.sfk file.
